title: Network Design UrbanBox Fitness Studio
description: Designed and prototyped a secure LAN for a commercial studio using Cisco Packet Tracer. Implemented VLAN segmentation, inter-VLAN routing, DHCP allocation, and network redundancy for high availability

title: Professional Portfolio Development
description: Developed and deployed a personal portfolio site using the Hugo framework. Managed the local development environment via PowerShell, configured technical sections for Skills and Education, and successfully migrated the local build to a live GitHub Pages server.

title: Cross-Platform Systems Integration
description: Configured Samba file sharing and secure SSH access between Linux and Windows environments. Developed BASH scripts to automate administrative tasks and performed full system troubleshooting.

title: Recon.py: Automated Security Tool
description: Developed a multi-threaded Python tool for automated network discovery, TLS security auditing, and web service fingerprinting with structured reporting.

title: Cryptography
description: Established a secure digital identity by generating and managing a personal PGP key.

title: Automated Threat Detection & Log Analytics
description: Developed a Python-based security tool to automate the analysis of web server logs. The script identifies attack patterns, extracts unique IPs, performs Geolocation lookups, and generates visual data summaries (Bar Charts).
